T02D1322:254b-1: shr'i d'a ki n'i badzra panydza ra sam ha ra na mandala aa nu re n'a s'a dha nam /
T02D1322:254b-3: dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1322:254b-4: bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub
T02D1322:254b-5: thabs / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1322:254b-6: gcig dang du mar spyad pa'i snying pos nyid kyi dngos grub la 'khrul zhi mdzad pa //
T02D1322:254b-7: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas bskyed pa rdo rje'i rtse mo'i bu gar gsal zhing 'od 'bar ldan //
T02D1322:254b-8: thugs rje shar par dag pa'i 'khor lor mdzad pas sems can don la brtul bas bcings pa'o //
T02D1322:254b-9: bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi brgyan kye rdo rje la bdag gi spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1322:254b-10: rol bcas zhabs ni 'dam skyes ldan //
T02D1322:254b-12: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag ni //
T02D1322:254b-13: rang dran phyir na bri bar bya //
T02D1322:254b-14: de nas gzhan yang sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mang po la dmigs nas /
T02D1322:254b-15: snying rje'i ro shin tu rgyas pa la 'jug par byed pa dang /
T02D1322:254b-16: bdag dang gzhan rnam par brtags pas sems can rnam par rgyas par gyur pa dang //
T02D1322:254b-17: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu por sems kyi rgyun yongs su dag pa can dang /
T02D1322:254b-18: rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bla ma mnyes par
T02D1322:254b-19: byed pa'i skyon rnams la sogs pa dang bral ba
T02D1322:254b-20: dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub
T02D1322:254b-21: pa la brtson 'grus kyi mthu yis sems rtag tu
T02D1322:254b-22: dang / non pa dang / dpal dang ldan pa'i
T02D1322:254b-23: mkha' 'gro ma gur gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D1322:254b-24: zhing cho ga bzhin du rjes su gnang ba thob
T02D1322:254b-25: pa'i sngags thun mtshams kyi dang por langs te /
T02D1322:254b-26: rang gi snying gar re pha las byung ba'i nyi
T02D1322:254b-27: ma'i dkyil 'khor la dam pa'i dang po sa bon
T02D1322:254b-28: rnam par bkod de bzhag la /
T02D1322:254b-29: dur khrod la sogs pa'i phyogs la lar tsandan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te /
T02D1322:254b-30: me tog rnam pas nye par mdzes pa byas pa'i
T02D1322:254b-31: sa'i char zhing chen la sogs par rdo rje skyil
T02D1322:254b-32: mo krung gis nye par 'dug ste /
T02D1322:254b-33: lag pa'i lo ma dag ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag
T02D1322:255a-0: rgyar yang dag par bsdus te 'dug nas @255a *
T02D1322:255a-1: // yi ge h'um las 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis
T02D1322:255a-2: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1322:255a-3: rnams nam mkha'i bar snang gi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs
T02D1322:255a-4: par dmigs la mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1322:255a-5: de la mchod pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1322:255a-6: 'od kyi sgo nas nges ston pa'i //
T02D1322:255a-7: padma'i lag ldan rnam par sgeg / sgeg sogs lha mo rnams kyis ni //
T02D1322:255a-8: yang dag par ni mchod par bya //
T02D1322:255a-9: thog med srid par skyes pa yi //
T02D1322:255a-10: sdig sogs cho ga bzhin bshags bya //
T02D1322:255a-11: bde gshegs tshogs kyi spyan sngar ni //
T02D1322:255a-12: bdag gi sdig pa'i phung po bshags //
T02D1322:255a-13: thub sogs sras dang bcas rnams kyi //
T02D1322:255a-14: srid gsum skye bo dngos rnams kyi //
T02D1322:255a-15: bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la //
T02D1322:255a-16: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1322:255a-17: rnam rtog kun ni rab bcom pa'i //
T02D1322:255a-18: rgyal ba rnams la bdag dbul lo //
T02D1322:255a-19: srid pa byed par nges 'dzoms pa'i //
T02D1322:255a-20: byang chub sems su sems gcig ste //
T02D1322:255a-21: phyogs bcu kun tu nges par ni //
T02D1322:255a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi //
T02D1322:255a-23: zhi ba'i dkon mchog gsum 'di la //
T02D1322:255a-24: da lta nyid nas skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1322:255a-25: srid gsum skye bo la phan pa'i //
T02D1322:255a-26: rin chen lam ni bdag gis bsten //
T02D1322:255a-27: dngos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong zhing //
T02D1322:255a-28: mtshan ma med cing rgyu med par //
T02D1322:255a-29: gang phyir brtags pas rnam grol bas //
T02D1322:255a-30: smon pa dang ni dral bar 'gyur //
T02D1322:255a-31: de ltar kun gyi rnam gsal zhing //
T02D1322:255a-32: sgyu ma lta bur rnam bsams nas //
T02D1322:255a-33: ma rig la sogs skyon sogs pa //
T02D1322:255a-35: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1322:255a-36: zhes brjod la nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1322:255a-37: bsod nams ye shes dag gis brtags pas bsags pa'i dbang la sku gsung nyid 'dod na //
T02D1322:255a-38: nyi ma la gnas sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes 'jigs pas sa bon h'um las skyes mtshan pa'i //
T02D1322:255a-39: 'di las ra ba la sogs bzhi po rnams ni skyes bar rab tu bsam byas par //
T02D1322:255a-40: bhrum zer las byung rtsibs bcu ldan pa'i 'khor lo mi g-yo lta bur 'khor ba byas nas ni //
T02D1322:255a-41: de la chu skyes nyi mar mnyam med gshin rje mthar byed la sogs h'um dang mtshan mas bskyed //
T02D1322:255a-42: g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis rnam par rol cing g-yo can rnams ni mnan par bsam //
T02D1322:255b-0: de yi dbus su @255b h'um dang rdo rje las skyes rdo rje h'um mdzad de //
T02D1322:255b-1: aanda rnyil 'od 'dra ba'i gong bu lta bur sku mdzes gyur //
T02D1322:255b-2: sna tshogs na bza'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1322:255b-4: padma'i phyag ni rab sprel te //
T02D1322:255b-5: phyag rgya'i mchog ni thugs kar mdzad //
T02D1322:255b-6: rin chen dbu rgyan dang ldan par //
T02D1322:255b-7: thugs kyi rdo rje rab tu bzhugs //
T02D1322:255b-8: lha mo dka' zlog ma yi nu ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1322:255b-9: mos pa med pa'i dgra bo'i ri bos mtshan ma can gyi yan lag gi //
T02D1322:255b-10: dam par rab tu bsdus pa'i gnas su mtshan ma can gyi zhe sdar la //
T02D1322:255b-11: g-yon brkyang ba yi chu skyes zhabs kyis rab tu mnan cing rnam par sgeg pa ste //
T02D1322:255b-12: ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1322:255b-14: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D1322:255b-15: rta mgrin dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
T02D1322:255b-16: dpa' bo 'di rnams sngon po dang /
T02D1322:255b-19: mig sman lta bu la sma ra dmar ser dang /
T02D1322:255b-20: smin ma rab tu 'khyug pa dang /
T02D1322:255b-21: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa dang /
T02D1322:255b-22: nags tshal chen po lta bus lus brgyan pa /
T02D1322:255b-23: gsus pa ldir zhing sku thung ba dang /
T02D1322:255b-24: smad stag gi pags pas dkris shing seng ge'i pags
T02D1322:255b-25: pa bsnams pa kha nas 'bar ba'i dug 'phro ba
T02D1322:255b-26: can gyi klu rnams kyis sku la mdzes pa'o /
T02D1322:255b-27: tho ba dang dbyug pa dang /
T02D1322:255b-29: rdo rje rnam par gyes pa ni phyag gi padma rnams na'o //
T02D1322:255b-31: thugs dang tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D1322:255b-32: don yod grub pa rnams kyis yan lag gi mchog la brgyan pa'o //
T02D1322:255b-40: dbang ldan gyi grva rnams su ni /
T02D1322:255b-43: stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba rnams mdog sngon por ro //
T02D1322:255b-47: ral gri rnams ni rim pa bzhin du phyag gi lo ma rnams la'o //
T02D1322:255b-48: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas dbu brgyan cing rin po che bzang po rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1322:255b-49: stobs po che dang dbyug pa sngon po yang gshin
T02D1322:255b-50: rje gshed po ji lta bar khro ba rnam par
T02D1322:256a-0: gtsigs pa'o // steng du ni bhr'um dang 'khor lo las phyung ba'i @256a * //
T02D1322:256a-1: gtsug tor 'khor los skyur ba gser btso ma'i kha dog dang mnyam pa /
T02D1322:256a-2: phyag na 'khor los rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D1322:256a-3: rin po che la sogs pas brgyan cing rin po
T02D1322:256a-4: che'i dbu rgyan la rnam par snang mdzad gnas pa'o
T02D1322:256a-5: // 'og tu gnas pa ni gnod mdzes te /
T02D1322:256a-7: rin po ches dbu brgyan pa la mi bskyod pa gnas pa /
T02D1322:256a-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1322:256a-9: thams cad kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D1322:256a-10: sdug bsngal la sogs pa shes pa bcu po rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1322:256a-11: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par gnon pa'o //
T02D1322:256a-12: thams cad kyi phyag g-yon pa rnams ni klu'i zhags
T02D1322:256a-13: pa dang ldan pa'i sdigs mdzub snying gar bkod pa
T02D1322:256a-15: 'di ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo gang 'dod pas srung ba'i 'khor gtso bo bya'o //
T02D1322:256a-16: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo zhu ste /
T02D1322:256a-17: ri bong 'dzin gyi gong bur gyur pa'i gyen du
T02D1322:256a-18: gnas pa gru gsum pas nye bar mdzes shing phyogs
T02D1322:256a-19: kyi sgo kun du rab tu gsal ba can /
T02D1322:256a-20: nang gi nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo rnam par
T02D1322:256a-21: dag par rdo rje padmo chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam
T02D1322:256a-22: par bsam mo // der yam ram bam lam zhes
T02D1322:256a-23: bya ba'i sa bon rnams kyis rim pa ji lta
T02D1322:256a-24: bar rlung dang me dang chu dang sa 'dzin pa'i
T02D1322:256a-25: dkyil 'khor rnams su so sor bya ba'i don te
T02D1322:256a-27: dbang po rnams rnam par dag par bsam pa'o /
T02D1322:256a-28: der bhr'um dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par
T02D1322:256a-30: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gong bu las /
T02D1322:256a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D1322:256a-32: khams gsum thams cad ro gcig pa'i gzugs bsod nams
T02D1322:256a-33: dang ye shes kyi tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas
T02D1322:256a-34: su 'gyur ro // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D1322:256a-35: dzny'a na aa la ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma
T02D1322:256a-36: su 'gyur ro // ko& ham / zhes 'dis nga rgyal dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D1322:256a-37: gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1322:256a-38: de'i steng dbus su a'a li dang k'a li nyis 'gyur du bltas la /
T02D1322:256a-39: de yongs su zhu bas zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1322:256a-40: ma lang lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1322:256a-41: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1322:256a-42: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu so gnyis dang /
T02D1322:256b-0: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnam par dag pa'i rang @256b bzhin du rab tu go bar bya'o //
T02D1322:256b-1: de sa bon h'um dang aa las skyes pa'i sna
T02D1322:256b-2: tshogs rdo rje dam pas mtshan pa'i mtsho nas skyes
T02D1322:256b-3: pa'i snod dag la des mtshan pa ni don gyi
T02D1322:256b-4: dngos po thams cad so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1322:256b-5: no // de'i 'od zer gyis thub pa'i tshogs rnams
T02D1322:256b-6: su 'thon nas 'gro ba kun gyi shin tu sdug
T02D1322:256b-7: bsngal zhi bar mdzad de byon pas rab tu zhugs
T02D1322:256b-8: pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so
T02D1322:256b-9: no // // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid ni /
T02D1322:256b-11: zhes nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1322:256b-12: de dag ni 'byung ba rnams dang /
T02D1322:256b-13: dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin yan lag dag par khong du chud par bya'o /
T02D1322:256b-14: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1322:256b-15: sangs rgyas gnas bzhi rdzogs nas ni //
T02D1322:256b-16: rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya //
T02D1322:256b-18: tshig 'dis ni dbang po lnga ni mtshan ma la sogs pa ldan pa la bshad do //
T02D1322:256b-19: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ni dpe med pa
T02D1322:256b-20: rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi rdul phra rab yongs su bsdus
T02D1322:256b-21: pa'i sku'i yan lag gi mdangs ston ka'i zla ba
T02D1322:256b-22: lta bu / kun du nam mkha' dang mnyam pa /
T02D1322:256b-23: stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin las byung ba ste /
T02D1322:256b-24: zhal gsum ni sngon po dang /
T02D1322:256b-25: dmar po dang dkar po la /
T02D1322:256b-26: lha mo lnga po ni nag por ro //
T02D1322:256b-27: de dag ni mchog bde ba'i dngos po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsam pa'o //
T02D1322:256b-28: de'i thugs ka'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams kyis de bzhin
T02D1322:256b-29: gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams drangs te bcug la gzugs la
T02D1322:256b-30: sogs pa'i lha mo rnams su phyung ste /
T02D1322:256b-31: rang gi lha mor bcug par bya'o //
T02D1322:256b-32: de'i padma'i lte bar dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1322:256b-33: grib ma dang sgyu ma lta bur 'jig rten na
T02D1322:256b-34: grags pa'i dri za'i skyes bu drangs te bcug pas
T02D1322:256b-35: dbang bskur te / thabs cig lha mo'i padma'i lte bar 'dug nas /
T02D1322:256b-36: yi ge ho: 'bar ba gnyis kyi bar du bcug pa'i yi ge gsum po rnam par bsams la /
T02D1322:256b-37: 'dod chags chen po'i yi ge rnams 'od du zhu
T02D1322:256b-38: bas da dngul chu lta bur song bar bltas la
T02D1322:256b-39: / thog ma med par grub pa'i spos byed ma
T02D1322:256b-40: la sogs pas rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bu
T02D1322:256b-41: rnams kyis bskul bar bsam mo //
T02D1322:256b-42: khyod ni rdo rje'i skyon rnams yongs su skyong mdzad dag pa'i thugs //
T02D1322:257a-0: shin tu rnam par chos kyis rab tu brgyan byas bzang @257a * //
T02D1322:257a-2: spos mo bdag la di ring gzigs te stong pa dor mdzod la //
T02D1322:257a-3: 'dren pa 'jig rten pa yi rgyu las skyes pa
T02D1322:257a-4: bzhengs mdzod cig / khyod ni rdo rje gti mug
T02D1322:257a-6: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i chos kyis rab tu brgyan pa chos kyi sku //
T02D1322:257a-7: ri khrod ma bdag la gzigs mgon po stong pa dor mdzad la //
T02D1322:257a-8: mgon po 'dren pa 'jig rten pa yi rgyu las
T02D1322:257a-9: skyes pa bzhengs mdzod cig / khyod ni rdo rje
T02D1322:257a-10: chags pa yongs su skyong mdzad dag pa'i gsung //
T02D1322:257a-11: nges par so sor rtog pas rab tu brgyan pa bzang po'i sku //
T02D1322:257a-12: gtum mo bdag la di ring /
T02D1322:257a-13: gzigs te stong pa dor mdzad la //
T02D1322:257a-14: mgon po 'dren pa 'jig rten rgyu las skyes pa
T02D1322:257a-15: bzhengs mdzod cig / khyod ni sangs rgyas skyong mdzad
T02D1322:257a-16: thams cad gzugs // thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rab tu brgyan mdzad cing //
T02D1322:257a-17: sme mo bdag la di ring gzigs te stong pa dor mdzad la //
T02D1322:257a-18: 'dren pa 'jig rten pa yi rgyu las skye ba bzhengs mdzod cig / ces so //
T02D1322:257a-19: de lta bu'i snying rje chen po sngon du bskyed
T02D1322:257a-20: pa'i bsam pa'i thugs kyis rnal 'byor pa thig le
T02D1322:257a-22: h'um dang aam gi sa bon dag gis mtshan pa'i
T02D1322:257a-23: mtsho las skyes pa'i snod la sna tshogs rdo rjes
T02D1322:257a-24: mtshan par gyur par bsams te /
T02D1322:257a-25: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ting nge 'dzin
T02D1322:257a-26: la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po rang gi ngo
T02D1322:257a-27: bos spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du
T02D1322:257a-28: gnas te der brtan par byas pas /
T02D1322:257a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1322:257a-30: sku dpal he ru ka ste zhabs bzhi pos bdud
T02D1322:257a-31: bzhi mnan pa / nags kyi yan lag lta bu'i
T02D1322:257a-32: phyag bcu drug po rnams ni thod pa'i tshogs rnams
T02D1322:257a-33: bzhi mnan pa / bsnams pa / sku dang rtsa
T02D1322:257a-34: ba'i zhal ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi char sprin ltar
T02D1322:257a-35: bzhi mnan pa / bsnams pa / sngo ba'o //
T02D1322:257a-36: chu skyes kyi zhal g-yas pa dang g-yas pa ma
T02D1322:257a-37: yin pa dag ni ri bong 'dzin pa yongs su
T02D1322:257a-39: nyin mo byed pa gsar du shar ba lta bu'i 'od dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o //
T02D1322:257a-40: steng ma nyid ni rab tu rnam par gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1322:257a-41: lhag ma bzhi po rnams ni bung ba'i yan lag ltar shin tu 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1322:257a-42: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes
T02D1322:257b-0: shing skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis @257b bzhugs pa
T02D1322:257b-1: / stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can dbu'i lcang
T02D1322:257b-2: lo dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa nags
T02D1322:257b-3: tshal lta bu can mchog tu bzang po'i rdo rje
T02D1322:257b-4: / 'chang ba / phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa'i shin tu mdzes par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1322:257b-5: glo dang dbugs dang rims nang dang //
T02D1322:257b-6: glo khrag mdze nad 'brum bu dang //
T02D1322:257b-7: spos nad mchin nad rang bzhin te //
T02D1322:257b-8: glang po rta bong ban glang dang //
T02D1322:257b-9: rnga mo mi dang seng rgyal dang //
T02D1322:257b-10: de bzhin du ni byi la rnams //
T02D1322:257b-11: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams ni //
T02D1322:257b-12: gnyis 'thung la sogs rim bzhin shes //
T02D1322:257b-13: sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni //
T02D1322:257b-14: me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid //
T02D1322:257b-15: mthar byed nor sbyin nyid rnams ni //
T02D1322:257b-16: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la //
T02D1322:257b-17: sa sogs rim bzhin shes bya ste //
T02D1322:257b-18: dbang phyug la sogs rnam dag pa'o //
T02D1322:257b-19: kun bzang yang dag bsgom pa ni //
T02D1322:257b-20: rang lhag lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1322:257b-21: zhes gsungs pa 'dis ni rtog pa dang bcas pa
T02D1322:257b-22: la sogs pa'i bsam gtan lnga po dmigs par bya'o
T02D1322:257b-23: // srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshogs
T02D1322:257b-24: rnam par spangs par stong pa nyid snying rje dbyer
T02D1322:257b-25: mi phyed pas na chos kyi dbyings su nga rgyal
T02D1322:257b-26: // bya'o // aom dharma dha tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1322:257b-32: lus dang snying ga rnams su ri bong 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1322:257b-33: de rnams kyi steng du aom h'um tr'am hr'i: kham
T02D1322:257b-34: h'um sa bon dang gri gug yongs su zhub las
T02D1322:257b-47: rdo rje bdag med rnams te /
T02D1322:257b-48: gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa srog thung ba'i steng du gnas par dgod do //
T02D1322:257b-51: spyi bor ni h'um aam aom zhes pa'i sa bon te /
T02D1322:257b-52: de rnams las skyes pa'i mkha' spyod ma dang /
T02D1322:257b-54: sa 'og na spyod pa rnams kha dog sngon po dang /
T02D1322:257b-56: dkar po rnams rnam par bkod de spro ba la
T02D1322:257b-57: sogs sngon du byas nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D1322:257b-58: // aom khe tsa ri tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa aatma ko& ham /
T02D1322:257b-59: aom bh'u tsa ri w'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1322:258a-1: si ni k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1322:258a-2: zhes pa 'dis nga rgyal byas la /
T02D1322:258a-3: de nas rang gi snying gar dam tshig sems dpa' ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1322:258a-4: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i mtshan ma dang sa
T02D1322:258a-5: bon 'od kyi tshogs kyis thub pa'i tshogs la mchod
T02D1322:258a-6: de / de las rnam par spros pa'i 'od las
T02D1322:258a-7: lha mo'i tshogs rnams padma'i lag pa na bum par
T02D1322:258a-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi chus gang ba bsnams pa
T02D1322:258a-9: de / rnams phyung ste / bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba 'di ltar nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1322:258a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1322:258a-11: badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod do
T02D1322:258a-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyis dbu rgyan du dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1322:258a-13: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02D1322:258a-15: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1322:258a-16: yan lag bzhi po rnams kyi sku ste /
T02D1322:258a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs dang rnam par btsir ba dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba rnams ni /
T02D1322:258a-18: blo dman pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1322:258a-19: de nyid kyi mdun du dbu mar gyur pa'i rdo rje bdag med ma ste /
T02D1322:258a-20: g-yas pa lcug ma'i phyag na gdug pa can la bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo dang gri gug go //
T02D1322:258a-21: lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis gang ba'i
T02D1322:258a-22: thod pa bsnams pa'i lcug ma g-yon pas ni rgyal
T02D1322:258a-23: ba'i bdag po'i mgul pa nas 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1322:258a-25: de yongs su sbyang ba ni /
T02D1322:258a-26: aom h'um aam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba rnams ni
T02D1322:258a-27: sku dang thugs dang rin po che dang padma dmar
T02D1322:258a-28: po dang las kyi rigs rnams kyi bdag nyid de
T02D1322:258a-29: mgo bo dang / snying ga dang /
T02D1322:258a-33: yan lag rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1322:258a-34: h'um aam zhes pa'i sa bon dag gis padma dang lte ba dag par bya'o //
T02D1322:258a-35: h'um aam zhes pas ni rdo rje dang rin po che bskyed do //
T02D1322:258a-36: phat ser po dag ni bu ga dag tu'o //
T02D1322:258a-37: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a
T02D1322:258a-38: ga na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes
T02D1322:258a-39: pa 'dis nga rgyal dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D1322:258a-40: bde bar gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid la zhugs pa'i cho gas rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D1322:258a-41: de dag ni dang po rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1322:258a-42: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi dra bas thub pa'i tshogs rnams drangs te /
T02D1322:258a-43: bdag nyid la bcug la lha mo'i padma'i lce bar
T02D1322:258b-0: gtsub shing gtsubs pas bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i @258b
T02D1322:258b-1: 'khor lo la brtan par byas nas bla ma'i man
T02D1322:258b-2: ngag rjes su shes pas bzung ste kun du spro
T02D1322:258b-3: bar bya'o // de la sa bon gam yongs su
T02D1322:258b-4: zhu ba las ri bong 'dzin pa dang 'dra ba
T02D1322:258b-5: bar bya'o // la / g-yas pas lcags kyu bsnams shing /
T02D1322:258b-6: padma'i phyag g-yon na gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub brtson par mdzad ma ste /
T02D1322:258b-7: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1322:258b-9: dad pa rnam pa gsum dag pa'i ser mo shar sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1322:258b-10: de bzhin du sa bon tsam las gser btso ma
T02D1322:258b-11: dang mtshungs shing g-yas pa na tshe chen po'i rdo
T02D1322:258b-12: rje zhags pa can gyi chom rkun ma lho phyogs
T02D1322:258b-14: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1322:258b-16: brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i gzugs can bsam par bya'o //
T02D1322:258b-17: sa bon bam las ro langs ma nyi ma 'char ka dang 'dra ba ma sku mdzes ma ste /
T02D1322:258b-19: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang 'dra ba rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can /
T02D1322:258b-20: g-yas pa'i phyag gi lo ma ni rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams pa /
T02D1322:258b-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo nub kyi sgor ro //
T02D1322:258b-22: sa bon gham las nor bu ljang ser ltar gsal ba'i sku rab tu mdzes ma'i za nus ma /
T02D1322:258b-23: phyag g-yas pa'i lo ma na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ma ste /
T02D1322:258b-25: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
T02D1322:258b-26: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ma byang gi sgor ro //
T02D1322:258b-27: dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang /
T02D1322:258b-28: rlung gi mtshams su ni spos byed ma dang /
T02D1322:258b-32: kha dog ni sngon po dang /
T02D1322:258b-35: sna tshogs kyi mdog can no //
T02D1322:258b-36: de las sa bon pam las spos byed ma /
T02D1322:258b-38: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dril bu 'dzin ma ste /
T02D1322:258b-40: snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1322:258b-41: sa bon sham las ri khrod ma phyag gnyis na
T02D1322:258b-42: mtsho las skyes pa'i snod la dge slong gnas pa
T02D1322:258b-43: dang / ri bong bsnams pa ste /
T02D1322:258b-44: chu'i khams dang byams pa chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1322:258b-45: sa bon tsam las drag 'dzin ma rol pa dang bcas la /
T02D1322:258b-46: phyag dag gi lo ma na 'khor lo dang me thab bsnams pa ste /
T02D1322:259a-0: me'i khams dang dga' ba chen @259a * //
T02D1322:259a-1: po rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1322:259a-2: sa bon dam gis sme mo phyag g-yas pa dang
T02D1322:259a-3: g-yon pa gnyis na rdo rje rgyal mtshan chen po
T02D1322:259a-4: bsnams pa'o // rlung gi khams dang btang snyoms chen
T02D1322:259a-5: po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i gzugs can
T02D1322:259a-6: bsnams pa'o // no // de dag sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1322:259a-7: mtsho las skyes pa nyin mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1322:259a-8: bsnams pa'o // no // gyi steng du / tshangs pa dang /
T02D1322:259a-15: thags bzangs ris rnams kyi rang bzhin mthil du 'dam
T02D1322:259a-16: skyes kyi zhabs rnams g-yon brkyang pa'i rol pas non
T02D1322:259a-17: pa dang / mi'i rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D1322:259a-18: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar zhing dbu la
T02D1322:259a-19: thod dang ldan pas sems can gyi don la thugs
T02D1322:259a-20: rje chen pos mchog tu brtson pa mchog tu dga'
T02D1322:259a-21: bas rnam par sgeg pa spyan gsum pa can no
T02D1322:259a-22: // de lta bur kun du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te /
T02D1322:259a-23: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi lcags kyus rgyal
T02D1322:259a-24: ba'i tshogs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs drangs nas
T02D1322:259a-25: / shar gyi sgo'i glor bltas la /
T02D1322:259a-27: pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes pas mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1322:259a-28: aom p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul te /
T02D1322:259a-29: gdan du me tog phul la yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1322:259a-30: de nas aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02D1322:259a-31: aom badzra tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D1322:259a-32: aom badzra be t'a l'i bandha bam /
T02D1322:259a-33: aom badzra ghasma r'i to sha ya ho:/
T02D1322:259a-38: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1322:259a-39: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa byas nas /
T02D1322:259a-45: spos byed ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dbu rgyan
T02D1322:259a-46: la yang thugs dang sku dang rdo rje rin po
T02D1322:259a-47: che dang / rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa rnams dbu rgyan du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1322:259a-48: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi
T02D1322:259a-49: lcags kyus ser mo la sogs pa rnams bkug ste
T02D1322:259a-50: drangs nas / rang gi lha mo'i padma'i dkyil du
T02D1322:259a-51: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur bsam zhing cung
T02D1322:259a-52: zhig srog bsdams te rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1322:259b-0: @259b de ltar rang gi rig ma'i ba spu'i bu
T02D1322:259b-1: gnas ser mo la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs 'thon
T02D1322:259b-2: pa rnams kyis zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1322:259b-3: gang ba'i snod rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyag gi padmor
T02D1322:259b-4: bsnams pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du rab
T02D1322:259b-5: tu gang ste sgyu ma lta bu la sogs par
T02D1322:259b-6: mkhas pa rnams kyis bltas la /
T02D1322:259b-7: dbye ba'i rnam par rtog pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o //
T02D1322:259b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a
T02D1322:259b-9: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas de'i nga rgyal
T02D1322:259b-10: du bya'o // de nas sgra brnyan lta bu'i tshogs kyis thams cad bstod pa byed par blta ste /
T02D1322:259b-11: khyed ni rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D1322:259b-12: khyod ni rang gi thugs kyis yongs su brnyes ldan pa //
T02D1322:259b-13: khyod ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun sbyangs shing //
T02D1322:259b-14: sems can rnams la thugs rje'i thugs stobs mdzad pa'o //
T02D1322:259b-15: sgyu ma'i spros pa rnams la rdo rje 'phel mdzad cing //
T02D1322:259b-16: ae ma'o brnyes ldan thugs kyi rdo rje he ru ka dpal bstod //
T02D1322:259b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sv'a
T02D1322:259b-19: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas nga rgyal du
T02D1322:259b-20: bya'o // de'i rjes su aam las skyes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1322:259b-21: de'i steng du ram las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor ram gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1322:259b-22: de'i steng du aa las byung ba'i padma'i snod yam gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1322:259b-23: de'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga dang sgrol ma rnams
T02D1322:259b-24: la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mtshan pa sbar
T02D1322:259b-25: zhing spros pas dri ma rnams dang bral te /
T02D1322:259b-26: de nas h'um las dham h'um gis mtshan pa /
T02D1322:259b-27: shel gyi rnam pa lta bus byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1322:259b-28: da la yi ge aom gyis ye shes kyi bdud
T02D1322:259b-29: rtsi'i rang bzhin drangs pa dbyer med pa'i sngags kyi
T02D1322:259b-30: ro mchog dang ldan pa rnam pa smin pa nus
T02D1322:259b-31: pa'i rang bzhin du bltas te /
T02D1322:259b-32: lce la rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa bsams nas
T02D1322:259b-33: snying gar sa bon gyi thig ler dkyil 'khor rab
T02D1322:259b-34: tu bkod la rab tu tshim par bya'o //
T02D1322:259b-35: aom badzra dzi hva h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis lce byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1322:259b-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta a'a
T02D1322:259b-37: satva badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas
T02D1322:259b-38: nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1322:259b-39: de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1322:259b-40: snying ga'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1322:259b-41: thams cad dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su byas te
T02D1322:260a-2: dkyil 'khor pa ni bdag la thim /
T02D1322:260a-3: bdag ni ye shes sems dpa' la thim /
T02D1322:260a-4: ye shes sems dpa' ni mtshan ma la'o //
T02D1322:260a-5: mtshan ma ni sa bon la'o //
T02D1322:260a-6: sa bon ni thig le la'o //
T02D1322:260a-7: thig le ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo skad cig tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par bsams la /
T02D1322:260a-8: spro ba la sogs pa de bzhin du bya ste /
T02D1322:260a-10: sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1322:260a-11: cad bcug ste zhu ba la padma'i lte ba'i rtse
T02D1322:260a-12: mor rang gi mtshan ma'i dbus su rin po che
T02D1322:260a-13: sna lnga la nyungs kar lta bu'i tshad tsam gyi
T02D1322:260a-14: nang du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs par byas
T02D1322:260a-15: pa las brtan zhing brtan la ji srid du mtshan
T02D1322:260a-16: ma lnga po skyes pa'i bar du bsam par bya'o
T02D1322:260a-17: // de nas phyis ni rjes su rnal 'byor gyis spro zhing bsdu ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1322:260a-19: ye shes yud tsam gyis bsgrubs pa la 'od zer
T02D1322:260a-20: mtha' yas pa'i tshogs rnams spro zhing rang gzhan rnams
T02D1322:260a-21: mthong bar 'gyur ba 'dir yang dag par rdzogs par
T02D1322:260a-22: gyur pa'i bar de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1322:260a-23: skyon ni nyin dang mtshan med par sngags kyi bzlas pa man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bya'o //
T02D1322:260a-24: sngags kyi bzlas pa de yang mi nus na /
T02D1322:260a-25: aom dha ra dh'a ra ya /
T02D1322:260a-27: badzra dhri ka h'um phat ces pas sngags kyi bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1322:260a-28: skyo na nyams dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D1322:260a-29: spyi bor zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge aom
T02D1322:260a-30: las bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pas nye bar tshim par
T02D1322:260a-31: bya'o // lha mo'i glu yis bde zhing rab spro rol byas nas //
T02D1322:260a-32: mchod pa la sogs pa ni bsam par bya'o //
T02D1322:260a-33: gang gi tshe na ldang bar 'dod pa na //
T02D1322:260a-34: ngag dang lus kyi g-yeng ba med par ni //
T02D1322:260a-35: 'khor lo 'di ni mchod cing bstod nas ni //
T02D1322:260a-36: mkhas pas langs te 'gro ba'i don byas nas //
T02D1322:260a-37: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po gdod nas ngag cing dri ma med par ni //
T02D1322:260a-38: gzugs sogs lha mo'i dngos sam yi dam lha la rdor 'dzin nam //
T02D1322:260a-39: sku rdo rje la sogs pa bde gshegs gnas su 'dir ni 'jug par bya //
T02D1322:260a-40: snying rje'i ngo bo bdud rtsi'i mchog 'thungs rtag tu yang dag bde //
T02D1322:260a-41: mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag khyer bar bya ba 'di kun ma nor bya //
T02D1322:260b-0: nyes pa zad pa bya phyir rang nyid @260b thugs
T02D1322:260b-1: rje'i ro dbang gyur pas dpal ldan las kyi rdo
T02D1322:260b-2: rje bsgom // snying gar zla bar yi ge kham
T02D1322:260b-3: las skyes shing de yis mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D1322:260b-5: de las 'thon pa'i 'od zer rnams kyi tshogs las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
T02D1322:260b-6: de bzhin gshegs sgra'i gzugs su 'khor lor gnas de bgegs rnams kun ni rab tu gzhig par bya //
T02D1322:260b-7: mnga' bdag tho rangs langs te mchod pa la sogs
T02D1322:260b-8: bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa cho ga bzhin du
T02D1322:260b-9: bya'o // phyi 'bred 'khor lo sems la btsud nas
T02D1322:260b-10: rig pa dang ni bcas par rtag tu nyal bar
T02D1322:260b-11: bya'o // bya / sems can rnams ni rdzogs pa'i
T02D1322:260b-12: byang chub rgyu ru rtag tu dge ba 'ang thams
T02D1322:260b-14: nyin rang dang ni mtshan dag phyed du yang ni
T02D1322:260b-15: langs la de bzhin rgya chen por ni bsam par
T02D1322:260b-16: bya'o // yan lag drug dang ting 'dzin gsum ni de ltar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1322:260b-17: yan lag drug po ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1322:260b-19: sangs rgyas gnas bzhi rdzogs nas ni //
T02D1322:260b-20: rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya //
T02D1322:260b-21: rnam pa lnga po bsgom byas te //
T02D1322:260b-22: kun du bzang po bsgom par bya //
T02D1322:260b-23: rang lhag lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1322:260b-24: dkyil 'khor de bzhin dgod bya ste //
T02D1322:260b-25: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang sogs rnams //
T02D1322:260b-26: rim pa ru ni sgom byed pa //
T02D1322:260b-29: 'dir yang kha cig tu ni kun du bzang po'i
T02D1322:260b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid du bzhengs par 'dod do
T02D1322:260b-31: // gzhan gyis ni khu ba las skyes par 'dod do //
T02D1322:260b-32: kha cig ni 'bras bu'i dngos po dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid du 'dod do //
T02D1322:260b-33: ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'dir go bar bya'o //
T02D1322:260b-34: de nas rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsdus pa'i dkyil
T02D1322:260b-35: 'khor mtha' dag bsgom par 'dod na ni rnam par
T02D1322:260b-36: snang mdzad zhu ba las dkyil 'khor lnga po so
T02D1322:260b-37: so'i dbyibs dang gdan du bcas pa bsgom pa la
T02D1322:260b-38: / gtso bo lnga'i gnas rnams so sor mngon par
T02D1322:260b-39: byang chub ba rnam pa lnga lnga'i tshul ni mthun
T02D1322:260b-40: / la / rang rang gi sa bon dang /
T02D1322:260b-42: de'i kha dog rnams mi mthun pa las rgyu'i bcom ldan 'das lnga bskyed de /
T02D1322:261a-0: cho ga bzhin du zhu ba las so so'i mtshams rnams kyi lha @261a * //
T02D1322:261a-1: mo rnams kyi rgyud las 'byung ba'i glu'i tshig gis bskul nas /
T02D1322:261a-2: yang so so'i mtshan ma dang sa bon las so
T02D1322:261a-3: so'i sku rnams ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du rdzogs
T02D1322:261a-4: pa / de la padma la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1322:261a-5: gsang gnas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag so sor byas te /
T02D1322:261a-6: dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gdon pa lugs dang mthun par
T02D1322:261a-7: rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi
T02D1322:261a-8: rang rang gi ming gi yi ge dang po rnams
T02D1322:261a-9: kyis phyag mtshan dang kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan
T02D1322:261a-10: pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du rdzogs par byas
T02D1322:261a-11: te / rang rang gi gnas su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1322:261a-12: de rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bstims nas mig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1322:261a-13: bdud rtsi myang ba yan chad spyir mthun /
T02D1322:261a-14: yang na zhe sdang he ru ka'i rig ma'i gsang ba nas /
T02D1322:261a-15: so so'i gtso bo dang bcas pa rang rang gi
T02D1322:261a-16: sa bon las bton la gzhan ni gong ma dang
T02D1322:261a-17: mthun / sa bon rnams ni bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham gtso bo bzhi'o //
T02D1322:261a-18: sam pam bam aam sgom bzhi'o //
T02D1322:261a-19: pam dum dam mam mtshams ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-20: sum dum ram tam rdo rje nyi ma'i sgo ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-21: lam ham nram grim mtshams ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-22: pam dam ya shlam padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgo ma bzhi'o //
T02D1322:261a-23: bam bim mum mum mtshams rnams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-24: tam kum kam pam rta mchog gi sgo ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-25: lam mam pam tam mtshams kyi'o //
T02D1322:261a-26: kye'i rdo rje ni shin tu gsal lo //
T02D1322:261a-27: sngags kyi phreng ba zlos na snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rnams te rgyud las gsungs so //
T02D1322:261a-28: bdag dang bdag gi lta ba'i tshogs dang nyon mongs
T02D1322:261a-29: la sogs chu na gnas pa lta bus g-yeng pa
T02D1322:261a-30: rnams // 'khor ba'i chu bo'i dbus na gnas shing srog mtha' lta bur sdug bsngal skye ba kun //
T02D1322:261a-31: mgon po he ru ka yi sgrub thabs brjod cing byas pas bsod nams skyes pa gang yin pa //
T02D1322:261a-32: de yis 'jig rten pa rnams de bzhin nyid du rtag tu khyer zhing grol bar 'gyur bar shog //
T02D1322:261a-33: rgyud rgyal rdo rje gur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1322:261a-34: dad dang brtson 'grus gnyis kyis 'gro kun la //
T02D1322:261a-35: phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D1322:261a-36: 'gro kun rdo rje gur du 'jug par shog //
T02D1322:261a-37: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi sgrub thabs dkyil
T02D1322:261a-38: 'khor bsdus pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba
T02D1322:261b-0: / @261b slob dpon chen po lha'i brtul zhugs zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1322:261b-2: // / mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o /
T02D1322:261b-4: // / ston pa sh'akya thub pa yis //
T02D1322:261b-5: rgya gar rdo rje gdan drung du //
T02D1322:261b-6: r'a dza zas gtsang srid bor nas //
T02D1322:261b-7: dam chos me bzhin rab sbar te //
